title: National School Choice Week, 2025
summary: The document is a proclamation by President Donald J. Trump designating January 26 to February 1, 2025, as National School Choice Week. It emphasizes the importance of school choice in empowering parents to select educational options that align with their values and meet their children's needs. The President highlights past accomplishments in expanding educational freedom and expresses a commitment to continue working with lawmakers to enhance school choice across the nation. The proclamation asserts that school choice leads to improved educational outcomes, higher graduation rates, and enhanced school safety, while also generating significant fiscal savings for taxpayers. The overarching message is a call to action for fostering a culture that prioritizes educational freedom and innovation for future generations, positioning education as a cornerstone of American prosperity and ingenuity.
